title: I can't get bugsplat on my computer
body: Ok I have been trying EVERYTHING I can find on how to fix it from restarting my computer to getting rid of any shred of lol on my computer deleted and reinstalling it and nothing has work PLEASE help me!

replies.body:
http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif

If you've been seeing bugsplats happen more and more even after reinstalling, there might have been some corrupted game files that didn't get properly uninstalled. Let's try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on to make sure everything gets completely reinstalled. Let me know how it helps!

Wow that reinstall happened fast O_O. Make sure you used that tool to do the reinstall, since the usual way won't be sure to hit every single file. If you did already use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), go ahead and check the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well.
